title: Notifications still buzz when default sound is set to "None"
content:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Hit up or down on the volume rocker and put into vibrate mode
2. Go to Settings --> Sound --> Advanced --> Default notification sound. Choose 'None' from 'My Sounds' group.

Observed: Apps like Gmail and Outlook will continue to vibrate the device on newly incoming notifications, even though these notifications do not have 'Vibrate' enabled

Expected: Nothing should vibrate since the default notification sound is set to 'None' and the specific notifications are not set to 'Vibrate'.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
